edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.scheduler

Class WolfScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.scheduler.WolfScheduler

  • public class WolfScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to maintain WolfScheduler state and behaviors Creates schedule to add Activities to creates CourseCatalog to choose courses from
    Author:
    (Summer Mims)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WolfScheduler(java.lang.String fileName)
      Constructs a new WolfScheduler object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addCourse(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String section)
      add course to student's schedule returns true if Course can be added throws illegal argument exception if Course with same name exists in schedule if course is not in catalog, return false
      void addEvent(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime, int weeklyRepeat, java.lang.String eventDetails)
      add event to Schedule if duplicate event throw IllegalArgumentexception
      void exportSchedule(java.lang.String fileName)
      exports schedule to file uses writeCourseRecors() to export file throws IllegalArgumentException if IOException is thrown; error message "The file cannot be saved."
      java.lang.String[][] getCourseCatalog()
      returns 2D String array of catalog row for each Course three columns for name, section, and title if no Courses in catalog, empty String array is returned
      Course getCourseFromCatalog(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String section)
      get specified Course from courseCatalog if Course does not exist, return null
      java.lang.String[][] getFullScheduledActivities()
      returns 2D String array of student schedule row for each Course six columns for name, section, title, credits, instructorId, meetingDays String if no Courses in schedule, empty String array is returned
      java.lang.String[][] getScheduledActivities()
      returns 2D String array of student schedule row for each Course three columns for name, section, and title if no Courses in schedule, empty String array is returned
      java.lang.String getTitle()
      get title of schedule
      boolean removeActivity(int idx)
      removes Activity from student's schedule
      void resetSchedule()
      creates empty ArrayList and has schedule field work with new ArrayList
      void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
      set title of schedule throw illegal exception if null or empty String

    • Constructor Detail

      • WolfScheduler

        public WolfScheduler(java.lang.String fileName)
        Constructs a new WolfScheduler object. construct course catalog array list construct schedule array list set title to default "My Schedule" add Course objects from input file throws illegal argument exception if error
        Parameters:
        fileName - file to export to

    • Method Detail

      • getCourseFromCatalog

        public Course getCourseFromCatalog(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String section)
        get specified Course from courseCatalog if Course does not exist, return null
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Course to find
        section - the section of the Course to find
        Returns:
        Course

      • addCourse

        public boolean addCourse(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String section)
        add course to student's schedule returns true if Course can be added throws illegal argument exception if Course with same name exists in schedule if course is not in catalog, return false
        Parameters:
        name - the name of Course
        section - the section of Course
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if Course is added
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when time conflict

      • addEvent

        public void addEvent(java.lang.String title,
                     java.lang.String meetingDays,
                     int startTime,
                     int endTime,
                     int weeklyRepeat,
                     java.lang.String eventDetails)
        add event to Schedule if duplicate event throw IllegalArgumentexception
        Parameters:
        title - the Event title
        meetingDays - the Event meeting days
        startTime - the Event start time
        endTime - the Event end time
        weeklyRepeat - the Event times to repeat weekly
        eventDetails - the Event details
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if Event is duplicate

      • removeActivity

        public boolean removeActivity(int idx)
        removes Activity from student's schedule
        Parameters:
        idx - the index of the Activity
        Returns:
        boolean return true is Activity is removed

      • resetSchedule

        public void resetSchedule()
        creates empty ArrayList and has schedule field work with new ArrayList

      • getCourseCatalog

        public java.lang.String[][] getCourseCatalog()
        returns 2D String array of catalog row for each Course three columns for name, section, and title if no Courses in catalog, empty String array is returned
        Returns:
        courseCatalogArray the courseCatalog

      • getScheduledActivities

        public java.lang.String[][] getScheduledActivities()
        returns 2D String array of student schedule row for each Course three columns for name, section, and title if no Courses in schedule, empty String array is returned
        Returns:
        scheduleArray the schedule of Activities

      • getFullScheduledActivities

        public java.lang.String[][] getFullScheduledActivities()
        returns 2D String array of student schedule row for each Course six columns for name, section, title, credits, instructorId, meetingDays String if no Courses in schedule, empty String array is returned
        Returns:
        scheduleFullArray the full array of Activities

      • exportSchedule

        public void exportSchedule(java.lang.String fileName)
        exports schedule to file uses writeCourseRecors() to export file throws IllegalArgumentException if IOException is thrown; error message "The file cannot be saved."
        Parameters:
        fileName - file name to export to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if file cannot be saved
